query: What does the meta-analysis suggest regarding confidence in cognitive processes among individuals with obsessive-compulsive disorder? <choices>  a. query: What treatment was evaluated for its efficacy in reducing obsessive compulsive symptoms in children with pediatric acute-onset neuropsychiatric syndrome? <choices>  a. Intravenous Immunoglobulin b. Antidepressant Medications c. Cognitive Behavioral Therapy d. Psychodynamic Therapy

query: What neural activation patterns were observed in patients with obsessive-compulsive disorder under high cognitive demands during a working memory task? <choices>  a.
